title: The Good, the bad and the noodley
brief_description: Business is booming for Ninja Noodle which means business is bad for The Grubby Gruel. After the noodle shop is raided by the town bad apple, the good Shinobi must battle against the odds to return his secret sauce to its rightful place. East meets west in a noodle-filled western caper.
